data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, tie me ɛberɛ a mereka me haw;
Fa me sie firi amumuyɛfoɔ agyinatuo ho,
Wɔfiri atɛeɛ mu, to bɔ onipa a ne ho nni asɛm;
Wɔhyehyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho nkuran wɔ wɔn amumuyɛ nneyɛeɛ ho,
Wɔbɔ atɛnkyea ho pɔ na wɔka sɛ,
Nanso, Onyankopɔn bɛto bɛmma awɔ wɔn;
Ɔbɛdane wɔn ankasa tɛkrɛma atia wɔn
Ma teneneefoɔ nni ahurisie wɔ Awurade mu
